2 ^ Exaudī, Deus, dēprecātiōnem meam: 3 ^ Ā fīnibus terrae ad tē clāmāvī
intende ōrātiōnī meae. ^ Hear, O God, m: dum anxiārētur cor meum, in petrā exaltāvistī mē. Dēdūxistī mē, ^ To thee have I cried from the ends of the earth
when my heart was in anguish, thou hast exalted me on a rock. Thou hast conducted me,

intende ōrātiōnī meae. ^ Hear, O God, m: turris fortitūdinis ā faciē inimīcī. ^ For thou hast been my hope
a tower of strength against the face of the enemy.

2 ^ Exaudī, Deus, dēprecātiōnem meam: 5 ^ Inhabitābō in tabernāculō tuō in saecula
intende ōrātiōnī meae. ^ Hear, O God, m: prōtegar in vēlāmentō ālārum tuārum. ^ In thy tabernacle I shall dwell for ever
I shall be protected under the covert of thy wings.

2 ^ Exaudī, Deus, dēprecātiōnem meam: 6 ^ Quoniam tū, Deus meus, exaudīvistī ōrātiōnem meam
intende ōrātiōnī meae. ^ Hear, O God, m: dedistī hērēditātem timentibus nōmen tuum. ^ For thou, my God, hast heard my prayer
thou hast given an inheritance to them that fear thy name.

intende ōrātiōnī meae. ^ Hear, O God, m: annōs ejus usque in diem generātiōnis et generātiōnis. ^ Thou wilt add days to the days of the king
his years even to generation and generation.

2 ^ Exaudī, Deus, dēprecātiōnem meam: 8 ^ Permanet in aeternum in conspectū Deī
intende ōrātiōnī meae. ^ Hear, O God, m: misericordiam et vēritātem ejus quis requīret? ^ He abideth for ever in the sight of God
his mercy and truth who shall search?

2 ^ Exaudī, Deus, dēprecātiōnem meam: 9 ^ Sīc psalmum dīcem nōminī tuō in saeculum saeculī, ut reddam vōta mea dē diē in diem. ^ So will I sing a psalm to thy name for ever and ever, that I may pay my vows from day to day.
